text:
@GeorgeTakei When did scientists forget Occam's Razor?

We have unknowing hosts coughing on candy bars or touching doorjambs.  SARS2 lives for days on some surfaces.

Measures that inhibit self-inoculation are credited for proving airborne transmission.

Mind your hands.

#COVID19 #pandemic
